concept.title: Custom Stage Libraries
concept.shortdesc: If you develop custom stages, store the stage libraries in a local directory external to the Data Collector installation directory. Use an external directory to enable use of the custom stage libraries after Data Collector upgrades.

conbody.p: custom stageslibrariesuser librariesstoringFor more information about developing your own custom stages, see the following StreamSets tutorial: Creating a Custom StreamSets Destination.
